nodes.text: Masquerade is a mini adventure for use in the Rise of the Empire era, published on the Wizards of the Coast website. It was written by Morrie Mullins and published on March 20, 2003.

In this scenario, the characters must attend a famous annual masquerade party aboard a luxury space yacht, where they'll mingle with the costumed guests and ferret out the villains who've kidnapped the host's daughter.
"Masquerade" is intended for four player characters of 7th to 9th level.
